title: bhAratI dEvi tAye
sahitya:
bhratI dEvi tAye nI kAye mArutana rANiye


anupallavi

  sEride ninna pAda sEvakanenisamma


caraNam 1    pannagEsha suparNa pannaga bhUSaNa cinnumaya surarim sEvita 
ghanna mahimau innEna baNNIpe ninna patige binna visennanud-dharisamma
    caraNam 2    muktA muktaroDeyaLe tatvAbhimAni rakta shukla sambandha tanu dUraLe 
uttama guNanidhi shrIshana bhajipaLe citta bandantenna bhrtyanendeNisamma
    caraNam 3    mattondu anyAshrayavu nODidarilla itta bArentendu karevarilla 
citta jananya shrI purandara viTTalana bhrtyara bhrtyara bhrtyanandeNisamma
